//Md. Ahsan Kabir Shohagh
#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define sz 100000
#define pb(a) push_back(a)
#define ll long long
#define ull unsigned long long
#define fread freopen("input.txt","r",stdin)
#define fwrite freopen("output.txt","w",stdout)
#define inf (1<<29)
#define mem(abc,z) memset(abc,z,sizeof(abc))
#define PI acos(-1)

int main(){
   string s;
   int x,remainDollar;
   cin>>x>>s;
   remainDollar=x;
   for(int i=0;i<s.size();i++){
      if(s[i]=='L'){
         remainDollar=(remainDollar/2)+(remainDollar&1);
      }
      else if(s[i]=='W'){
         remainDollar=remainDollar*2+11;
      }
   }
   cout<<remainDollar<<endl;
   return 0;
}
